main event: An unidentified cylindrical object was reported as a fallen item in North Vernon, Indiana on May 8, 1963.
interesting points: The object was described as cylindrical, 18 to 24 inches in diameter and 6 to 7 feet long,Painted red and white, the object dropped by parachute and had devices that appeared to be meters,The Air Force and State Police had possession of the object, It was determined to be a 200-pound unidentified object, the object was sent to Bunker Hill Air Force Base for further study.
witness description: No witnesses were mentioned in the report.
